programmes.show_description: Island Adventure: Stewie and Brian head out on an adventure to a giant floating garbage island in search of Stewie's tricycle, while Lois helps Quagmire find success dating.
Bri, Robot: Brian worries about his ongoing legacy, so Stewie creates a robot clone of him as a living biography. Elsewhere, Peter begins work at a massage parlour.
Hamerican Dad!: Despite having huge reservations, Stan invites Roger to join his ham club. Meanwhile, Francine plots to frighten Greg.
An Irish Goodbye: Stan and Jeff's game annoys Hayley, who can't understand how Francine puts up with it. Enraged, Hayley and Francine take a break from their marriages.
Ready Player Gene: Animated comedy. Bob journeys into cyberspace when Gene's decision to spend all his savings on trying a new VR gaming arcade comes with disappointment.
Seasons: US mystery crime drama series. Alice welcomes a new addition to the family to snap Doug out of his funk, and Catherine is torn as she must help sell her childhood home.

All Fear the Freak: Animated adventures. A monster known as the Freak of Crystal Cove is willing to bring the caves beneath Crystal Cove down on the gang to preserve his secret.
The Night the Clown Cried: Animated adventures with Scooby. With the gang split up, Crystal Cove comes under attack from a monster known as Crybaby Clown.
Some Fred Time: Animated adventure series. An overworked Fred takes some time off from mysteries at Daphne's family's beach house - unfortunately, a walking shark then attacks!
There Wolf: Animated adventure series. The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill, but things go from bad to worse when a werewolf goes on the rampage.
Nathan Ramsey: Diversity member, model and influencer Nathan Ramsey is given five menus put together by five potential blind dates - who will he want to see for seconds?

programmes.show_description: Reality series. There is huge excitement as the Shepherds share some life-changing news, and Sue's struggle with the menopause flares up at a ladies' lunch.
